Study Title: An Open-Label Study to Assess the Long-term Safety of AXS-05 in Subjects with Dementia of the Alzheimer's Type, ADVANCE-2 and ACCORD-2 Extension Study
Brief Summary: The primary objective of this open-label extension trial is to evaluate the long-term safety of AXS-05 for the treatment of Alzheimer's disease agitation in subjects that participated in ADVANCE-2 and ACCORD-2.
Conditions: Agitation in Patients with Dementia of the Alzheimer's Type|Alzheimer Disease|Agitation, Psychomotor
Primary Outcome Measures: Long-Term Safety, Incidence of treatment-emergent adverse events following dosing with AXS-05, Up to 25 weeks
Study Design: Allocation: NA|Intervention Model: SINGLE_GROUP|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
